sprites

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • sprites.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Chest, Enemy, Gate, Obstacle, Turtle

    public abstract class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a default sprite.
    Version:
    5/6/22
    Author:
    Byron Tam, Tapish Singh(Mr. Shelby's collision method)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sprite(java.lang.String img, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      This creates a sprite at a specified place in the coordinate grid and places it facing a certain direction.
